lines.text: Turn it off! Turn if off! TURN IT OFF!
Nobody makes it. Nobody shows it. Nobody sees it. It's like it doesn't even exist.

[introducing himself during the audition]
I'm Big Dick Blaque.
A lot of strange things happen in this world. Things you don't know about in Grand Rapids. Things you don't want to know about. Doors that shouldn't be opened.
And I thought I was fucked up.
Look, how important do you think sex is?
Well then we're just alike. I mean, you think it's so unimportant that you don't even do it. I think it's so unimportant that I don't care who I do it with.
So I guess we're both fucked, huh? Least you get to go to heaven. I don't get shit.
